::Orchestra::

     Orchestra rested his head in his hand, thinking.

     "Hmm, a plan......Well, we could sort of temporarily throw away or
erase my signature, then I can act like a new Alliance member.....Or, I can
sneak in, and you can have hidden reinforcements around the base in case
anything happens.....You got any ideas?" Orchestra said.
